title: Planet Hollywood names former TGI Friday’s CEO to head India & Asia expansion
description: “We will be looking at local partners to develop the hotels,” Rohan Jetley said. “The market for the lifestyle hotel category is rapidly growing and has become the preferred category with global travellers,” he said. The expansion plans could include partnerships with ancillary brands that are part of Planet Hollywood group, which could be added to the hotel and resort projects.
